body.p: City in the western part of central Palestine. It was located in the territory of Dan (Jos 19:44) and allotted to the Levite clan of Kohath (21:23). Baasha killed King Nadab at Gibbethon when Israel was taking the city from the Philistines (1Â Kgs 15:27). About 26 years later, Omri was proclaimed king at Gibbethon (16:17).
